attributes.additional_details: You should make June 21st a Bank holiday to allow people to mingle with friends and visit the pub freely, to celebrate the year and allow pub trades etc to get back on their feet.
attributes.background: Make June 21st a Bank Holiday providing COVID Vaccines are met.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
